response.original_title: Variations on the Theme of (The Ocean View Resort)
response.overview: A continuation of Miyagi’s “American Boyfriend” series, which is based on the theme of the “possibility of an Okinawan man and an American man falling in love in Okinawa”. Variations on the theme of (The Ocean View Resort) reflects with hindsight on his identity, his former relationship and his homeland.
response.title: Variations on the Theme of (The Ocean View Resort)
